## [Fill](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill)

### Methods

|                                                                        Method                                                                         |                                    Return type                                     |                                                                           Brief description                                                                            |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [getSolidFill()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#getSolidFill())                                                      | [SolidFill](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/solid-fill) | Get the solid fill of this background, or `null` if the fill type is not [FillType.SOLID](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill-type#SOLID). |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#getType())                                                                | [FillType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill-type)   | Get the type of this fill.                                                                                                                                             |
| [isVisible()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#isVisible())                                                            | `Boolean`                                                                          | Whether the background is visible.                                                                                                                                     |
| [setSolidFill(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(Color))                                            | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/color).                                                            |
| [setSolidFill(color, alpha)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(Color,Number))                              | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given alpha and [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/color).                                                  |
| [setSolidFill(red, green, blue)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(Integer,Integer,Integer))               | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given RGB values.                                                                                                                           |
| [setSolidFill(red, green, blue, alpha)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(Integer,Integer,Integer,Number)) | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given alpha and RGB values.                                                                                                                 |
| [setSolidFill(hexString)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(String))                                       | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given hex color string.                                                                                                                     |
| [setSolidFill(hexString, alpha)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(String,Number))                         | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given alpha and hex color string.                                                                                                           |
| [setSolidFill(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(ThemeColorType))                                   | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given [ThemeColorType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/theme-color-type).                                        |
| [setSolidFill(color, alpha)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setSolidFill(ThemeColorType,Number))                     | `void`                                                                             | Sets the solid fill to the given alpha and [ThemeColorType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/theme-color-type).                              |
| [setTransparent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill#setTransparent())                                                  | `void`                                                                             | Sets the background to transparent.                                                                                                                                    |
